description:
Inquiring minds want to know what benefits them in each new release of Flash
Professional CC. In this course, Anastasia McCune answers your most burning
questions. Learn about the interface changes and performance improvements that
come with this update, plus the new Code Editor, JSAPI improvements, and
mobile testing enhancements.  
  
Note: Adobe Creative Cloud is updated on a regular basis. We will add more
tutorials as features are added or changed, so check back often.
title: Flash Professional: Creative Cloud Updates
